name: Metro Warriors
description:
Welcome welcome, to Metro Warriors. Where gang rats settle their differences in subterranean spectacles of gory disc-ness. Watched over by none other than Miss Brutal herself, who will rise victorious and join her gang of Metro Warriors?

  • Quick 5 min games
  • Easy to learn, but takes time to master
  • Competitive feeling

Metro Warriors team:

  • Lucas Van Baeveghem
  • Jens De Wachter
  • Thijs Snoeck
